feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-07-24T17:59:58.011697Z; ; ; ; ;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;Apple Vision Pro 开发者套件</stitle>; <id>;https://developer.apple.com/visionos/developer-kit/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-24T17:38:24.0392 94Z</updated>; <link href="https://developer.apple.com/visionos/developer-kit/"/>; <author>; <name>;Pulcinella</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Pulcinella</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://developer.apple.com/visionos/developer-kit/images/vision-side_2x.png" style="width: 220 px；高度：91px；" />;<br />;我们将向您借用 Vision Pro 开发工具包，帮助您为在 Vision Pro 上推出新 App Store 做好应用准备。与 Apple 专家联系以获得 UI 设计和开发指导，并帮助完善您的应用程序。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#apple-vision-pro-developer-kit" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36851535" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题类型="text">;Zenbleed</stitle>; <id>;https://lock.cmpxchg8b.com/zenbleed.html</id>; <更新>;2023-07-24T14:59:24.151400Z</更新>; <link href="https://lock.cmpxchg8b.com/zenbleed.html"/>; <作者>; <name>;loeg</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id =loeg</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://lock.cmpxchg8b.com/img/zb-vpcmpeqb.svg" style="width: 220px; height: 117px;" />;<br />;最近的CPU已将向量寄存器的宽度扩展到256位甚至512位，这在各种情况下都很有用。本文讨论了标准 C 库函数中向量寄存器的使用以及使用 vzeroupper 指令以避免不必要的停顿的必要性。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#zenbleed" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36848680" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;注意跨度一直在下降吗？ – 是的，65%</stitle>; <id>;https://slimemoldtimemold.com/2023/07/24/your-mystery-have-attention-spans-been-declined/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-24T17:46:24.153327Z</updated>; <link href="https://slimemoldtimemold.com/2023/07/24 /your-mystery-have-attention-spans-been-declined/"/>; <author>; <name>;janandonly</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=janandonly</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://slimemoldtimemold.files.wordpress.com/2023/07/image-8.png" style="width: 220px; height: 147 像素；” />;<br />;在过去二十年中，个人注意力持续时间可能下降了 65%，这一点令人担忧，因为知识工作取决于对手头任务的注意力。关于这个话题的直接研究很少，但有人声称注意力持续时间一直在下降，特别是随着社交媒体和智能手机的广泛使用。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#have-attention-spans-been-declined-yes-65" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36851644" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat .io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;变压器注意力关闭 1</stitle>; <id>;https://www.evanmiller.org/attention-is-off-by-one.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T17:35:24.154387Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.evanmiller.org/attention-is-off-by-one.html"/>; <author>; <name>; elbasti</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=elbasti</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.evanmiller.org/images/index/wizard2.png" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;注意力公式是现代人工智能的核心方程，但其中有一个错误，上周一直让我发疯。在这篇文章中，作者解释了当前一代 AI 模型如何在关键位置出现逐一错误，导致 Transformer 模型难以压缩和部署。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#transformer-attention-is-off-by-one" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Driver.js：产品介绍、亮点、上下文帮助等</stitle>; <id>;https://driverjs.com/</id>; <更新>; 2023-07-24T12:59:24.155245Z</updated>; <link href="https://driverjs.com/"/>; <author>; <name>;thunderbong</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=thunderbong</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://driverjs.com/driver.svg" style="width: 220px;高度：324px；” />;<br />;由于其广泛的 API，driver.js 可用于广泛的用例。通过突出显示功能，您可以消除干扰并将用户的注意力集中在重要的事情上。为您的用户提供上下文帮助，解释如何使用您的产品并回答常见问题。突出显示新功能，解释如何使用它们并确保您的用户不会错过它们。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#driver-js-product-tours-highlights-contextual-help-and-more" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36846520" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;How capacity planners credibly estimate application performance</stitle>; <id>;https://queue.acm.org/detail.cfm?id=3595862</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T15:59:24.156059Z</updated>; <link href="https://queue.acm.org/detail.cfm?id=3595862"/>; <author>; <name>;yarapavan</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=yarapavan</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://dl.acm.org/cms/attachment/html/10.1145/3595862/assets/html/cb1.png" style="width: 220px; height: 200px;" />;<br />;要衡量程序的性能，您需要查看给定负载下它使用的 CPU 量并尝试相乘。响应时间曲线是决定程序性能的重要因素。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#how-capacity-planners-credically-estimate-application-performance" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36849784" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat .io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Atari 推出了复古经典的收藏级街机电路板</stitle>; <id>;https://retrododo.com/atari-collectible-arcade- Circuit-boards/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T13:59:24.158799Z</updated>; <link href="https://retrododo.com/atari-collectible-arcade-circ-boards /"/>; <author>; <name>;ajdude</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ajdude</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://retrododo.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/atari_boards1-800x450.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;Atari 推出了具有收藏价值的复古经典街机电路板，可以用作损坏柜子的替换板，也可以作为令人惊叹的墙饰展示。这些板是与 Retro Arcade 合作创建的，并具有游戏徽标的丝网印刷图形和历史细分。目前，Atari 系列有五种复制品。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#atari-has-launched-collectible-arcade-circuit-boards-of-retro-classics" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36848037" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Show HN: I built a transit travel time map</stitle>; <id>;https://map.henryn.xyz</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T13:59:24.159787Z</updated>; <link href="https://map.henryn.xyz"/>; <author>; <name>;ng-henry</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ng-henry</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-i-built-a-transit-travel-time-map" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36847960" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Show HN: I spent 2 years building a personal finance simulator</stitle>; <id>;https://projectionlab.com/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T15:59:24.160695Z</updated>; <link href="https://projectionlab.com/"/>; <author>; <name>;scubakid</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=scubakid</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://res.cloudinary.com/dwihlaln3/image/upload/f_auto,q_auto,w_512/v1685146309/home/home-hero.png" style="width: 220px; height: 179px;" />;<br />;ProjectionLab 是一款功能强大的工具，可帮助可视化投资、支出等。它使用户能够做出明智的财务决策并规划未来。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-i-spent-2-years-building-a-personal-finance-simulator" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator. com/item?id=36849502" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Wasm_of_OCaml</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/ocaml-wasm/wasm_of_ocaml</id>; <更新>;2023-07-2 4T15:59:24.161643Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/ocaml-wasm/wasm_of_ocaml"/>; <作者>; <name>;eriangazag</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=eriangazag</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://opengraph.githubassets.com/75334 99ebb7448d12547f839cbc99c9a6acd183051c823f58c36c57ecfa856ed/ocaml-wasm/wasm_of_ocaml" style="宽度：220px; height: 110px;" />;<br />;Wasm_of_ocaml 依赖于 Binaryen 工具链。生成的代码适用于 Chrome beta 和 Node V8 canary。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#wasm-of-ocaml" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36849478" target="_ Blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;40 年前的昨天，加拿大航空 143 号航班在飞行途中耗尽燃油</stitle>; <id>;https://www.damninteresting.com/the-gimli-glider/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-24T16:59:24。 162625Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.damninteresting.com/the-gimli-glider/"/>; <作者>; <name>;bookofjoe</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=bookofjoe</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://damn-8791.kxcdn.com/wp-content/uploads/2007 /11/cover-new-2020.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 138px;" />;<br />;1983 年 7 月 23 日，加拿大航空 143 号航班出现燃油压力警告，最终在飞行途中耗尽燃油。飞行员利用飞机的滑翔能力成功紧急着陆。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#40-years-ago-yesterday-air-canada-flight-143-ran-out-of-fuel-mid-f light" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36850111" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Pikchr：用于技术文档中图表的类似 PIC 的标记语言</stitle>; < id>;https://pikchr.org/home/doc/trunk/doc/userman.md</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T12:59:24.163576Z</updated>; <link href="https://pikchr.org/home/doc/trunk/doc/userman.md"/>; <author>; <name>;gjadi</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id= gjadi</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;这是使用 Pikchr 生成图表的指南。这里的目标是提供有关使用 Pikchr 的实用且易于理解的教程。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#pikchr-a-pic-like-markup-language-for-diagrams-in-technical-documentation" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36847133" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;启动 HN: Artie (YC S23) – 实时数据复制到数据仓库</stitle>; <id>;https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36847569</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T13:59:24.164538Z</updated>; <link href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36847569"/>; <author>; <name>;tang8330</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=tang8330</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Artie 是一个开源数据流解决方案，可解决数据仓库中生产数据过时的问题。它支持从数据库到数据仓库的实时数据复制，具有亚分钟级的延迟并显着节省成本。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#launch-hn-artie-yc-s23-real-time-data-replication-to-data-warehouses" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36847569" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml: base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;你能听懂鸟吗？测试您对通话和歌曲的识别</stitle>; <id>;https://www.nytimes.com/interactive/2023/07/21/science/bird-calls-songs-quiz.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T15:59:24.165496Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.nytimes.com/interactive/2023/07/21/science/bird -calls-songs-quiz.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;fortran77</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=fortran77</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://static01.nyt.com/images/2023/07/20/science/00bird-quiz-top/B--E--Small-master315.jpg"样式=“宽度：220像素；高度：147像素；” />;<br />;鸟类（而非灵长类动物）的声音复杂性和变异性与人类最为接近。鸟类学家通过鸟类叫声数据库在理解鸟类交流方面取得了进展。鸟鸣与人类语言有相似之处，具有地域性方言和文化演变。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#can-you-understand-bird-test-your-recognition-of-calls-and-songs" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36835900" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;现金失忆症</stitle>; <id>;https://www.gsb.stanford.edu/insights/indulging-guilty-pleasure-dont-put-it-card</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T14:59:24.166582Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.gsb.stanford.edu /insights/indulging-guilty-pleasure-dont-put-it-card"/>; <author>; <name>;giuliomagnifico</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=giuliomagnifico</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.gsb.stanford.edu/sites/default/files/styles/1630x_variable/public /2023-07/photo-idea-Szu-chi-key.jpg.webp?itok=k4fXSppk" style="宽度：220px；高度：129px；" />;<br />;随着在线购物和数字支付的兴起，现金在美国的作用已经减弱。然而，一项新的研究表明，现金具有易于遗忘的优点，可以让消费者避免面对他们的支出记录。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#cash-amnesia" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36848305" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;C挂起 Android 强制门户页面 (2020)</stitle>; <id>;https://www.encrypted.at/android-captive-portal/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T12:59:24.167654Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.encrypted.at/android-captive-portal/"/>; <author>; <name>;transpute</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator .com/user?id=transpute</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.encrypted.at/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/android-debugging.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 126px;" />;<br />;如果您不希望 Android 手机在切换网络时始终联系 Google 服务器，您可以自行托管强制门户页面。为此，您需要一个 Web 服务器并能够返回“204 无内容”HTTP 状态代码。您可以通过打开手机的 shell/终端连接并使用适当的命令来更改 URL。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#chang-the-android-captive-portal-page-2020" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36846567" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io /feed.xml">; <title type="text">;数学宇宙假说（2007）</stitle>; <id>;https://arxiv.org/abs/0704.0646</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T13:59:24.168709Z</updated>; <link href="https://arxiv.org/abs/0704.0646"/>; <author>; <name>;a erialfrog</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=aerialfrog</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://static.arxiv.org/static/browse/0.3.4/images/arxiv-logo-fb.png" style="width: 220px; height: 129px;" />;<br />;本文探讨了外部现实假说（ERH）的物理含义，并认为它暗示了数学宇宙假说（MUH）。它讨论了 ERH 和 MUH 的各种含义，从标准物理主题到意识和平行宇宙等更广泛的问题。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-mathematical-universe-hypothesis-2007" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36847958" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io /feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Unicode 字符“𝕏” (U+1D54F)</stitle>; <id>;https://www.compart.com/en/unicode/U+1D54F</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T11:59:24.171805Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.compart.com/en/unicode/U+1D54F"/>; <author >; <name>;t0m44c</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=t0m44c</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;U+1D54F 是字符 Mathematical Double-Struck Capital X 的 unicode 十六进制值。Char U+1D54F，编码，HTML 实体：𝕏、𝕏、𝕏, UTF-8（十六进制）、UTF-16（十六进制）、UTF-32（十六进制） <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#unicode-character-u-1d54f" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36846076" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </ Entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Twitter 已正式将其徽标更改为“X”</stitle>; <id>;https://techcrunch.com/2023/07/24/twitter-has-officially-changed-its-logo-to-x/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T09:59:24.172966 Z</updated>; <link href="https://techcrunch.com/2023/07/24/twitter-has-officially-changed-its-logo-to-x/"/>; <作者>; <name>;pallas_athena</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pallas_athena</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://techcrunch.com/wp-content/upload s/2023/07/x-twitter.jpg?w=730" style="width: 220px; height: 101px;" />;<br />;Twitter 已正式将其徽标更改为“X”。Twitter 首席执行官埃隆·马斯克宣布了徽标更改，并暗示 Twitter 品牌将进一步发生变化。马斯克对字母“X”的痴迷是众所周知的，因为他创立了多家名称中带有“X”的公司。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#twitter-has-officially-changed-its-logo-to-x" target=" _blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36845111" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Nat 类型</stitle>; <id>;https://www.roxlu.com/2021/07 0/nat-types</id>; <更新>;2023-07-24T12:59:24.173994Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.roxlu.com/2021/070/nat-types"/>; <作者>; <name>;signa11</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=signa11</uri>; </author>; <content type="html ">;<img src="https://www.roxlu.com/images/posts/2021/070.nat-sent-packets.png" style="宽度：220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;在深入研究点对点通信时，您会遇到 STUN、ICE 和 NAT。本文重点介绍 NAT 的工作原理以及您需要了解的有关点对点连接的知识。NAT 是一种用于在您的网络和其他网络之间转换数据包的设备，它在 Internet 的运行中发挥着至关重要的作用。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#nat-types" target="_b lank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36846597" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;TikTok 正在添加文本帖子</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theverge.com/2023/7/2 4/23805530/tiktok-text-posts-micro-blogging-twitter-threads</id>; <更新>;2023-07-24T15:59:24.175011Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.theverge.com/2023/7/24/23805530/tiktok-text-posts-micro-blogging-twitter-threads"/>; <作者>; <name>;schnitzelstoat</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=schnitzelstoat</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://duet-cdn.vox-cdn.com/thumbor/0x0:3840x2160/2400x1600/filters:focal(1920x1080:1921) x1081):格式(webp)/cdn.vox-cdn.com/uploads/chorus_asset/file/24805699/d83a747d797e4853c6ff7f25ad2093a4.jpeg" style="width: 220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;短视频应用 TikTok 正在增加分享带有音乐和贴纸的文本帖子的功能，类似于 Instagram Stories。此时其他平台正试图将自己定位为 Twitter 的替代品。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#tiktok-is-adding-text-posts" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator .com/item?id=36849523" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;问 HN：哪一篇最近的研究论文让你大吃一惊？</stitle>; <id>;https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36846965</id>; <updated>; 2023-07-24T12:59:24.176034Z</updated>; <link href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36846965"/>; <author>; <name>;froster</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=froster</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;研究人员从警方拍卖网站购买了一堆缴获的手机，并发现其中约 25% 可以轻松解锁，并且仍然保存有嫌疑人和受害者的敏感数据。根据已灭绝的古代大麻野生型的原始位置的分布情况，从籼稻和籼稻转向喜马拉雅大麻和籼稻大麻。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#ask-hn-which-recent-research-paper-blew-your-mind" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36846965" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;MermaidJS 中序列图的不合理有效性</stitle>; <id>;https://jessems.com/posts/2023-07-22-the-unreasonable- effectiveness-of-sequence-diagrams-in-mermaidjs</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T10:59:24.177141Z</updated >; <link href="https://jessems.com/posts/2023-07-22-the-unreasonable-effectness-of-sequence-diagrams-in-mermaidjs"/>; <作者>; <name>;jessems</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jessems</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://jessems.com/_next/image?url =%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2F20230722225447.477bc2cf.png&w=1920&q=75" style="宽度：220px；高度：90px；" />;<br />;使用 MermaidJS 在代码中创建序列图出奇地令人愉快。它们快速、无痛且美观。 MermaidJS 与 Markdown 工具相结合是在实践中使用序列图的便捷方法。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-unreasonable-effectness-of-sequence-diagrams-in-mermaidjs" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36845714" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hacker news.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;IBM 大型机：它如何运行以及为何生存</stitle>; <id>;https://arstechnica.com/information-technology/2023/07/the-ibm-mainframe-how-it-runs-and-why-it-survives/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T11:59:24.178159Z</updated >; <link href="https://arstechnica.com/information-technology/2023/07/the-ibm-mainframe-how-it-runs-and-why-it-survives/"/>; <作者>; <name>;rbc</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=rbc</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdn.arstechnica.net/wp-内容/uploads/2023/06/new_IBM_z16-800x452.webp" style="宽度：220px；高度：125px；" />;<br />;大型计算机至今仍然具有重要意义，估计有 10,000 台在使用。它们被世界上最大的公司使用，其中大部分来自 IBM。大型机旨在处理大量数据工作负载并提供高可靠性。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-ibm-mainframe-how-it-runs-and-why-it-survives" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36846195" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hacker news.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;科学计算中的 Rust 与 Julia</stitle>; <id>;https://mo8it.com/blog/rust-vs-julia/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-24T11:59:24.179186Z</updated>; <link href="https://mo8it.com/blog/rust-vs-julia/"/>; <author>; <name>;E vgeniyZh</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=EvgeniyZh</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://mo8it.com/images/logo.svg" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;Julia 旨在通过提供灵活性和性能来解决两种语言问题。然而，在某些情况下，Rust 可能是更好的选择，因为它能够防止数据争用及其静态分析功能。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#rust-vs-julia-in-scientific-computing" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36845943" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
